# Base Simulation

One-species in space through time.
base code from: https://dmcglinn.github.io/quant_methods/lessons/simulations.html
Workflow:  

```{r}
# simple model of logistic growth
dNt <- function(r, N) r * N * (1 - N)

# iterate growth through time
Nt <- function(r, N, t) {
  for (i in 1:(t - 1)) {
    # population at next time step is population at current time + pop growth
    N[i + 1] <- N[i] + dNt(r, N[i])
  }
  N
}


t <- 100
r <- 0.1
# lets consider 4 different starting abundances (i.e., N(t=0) values)
Nt0 =  0.5
 plot(1:t, Nt(r, Nt0, t), type = 'l', xlab = 'time', ylab = 'Population size',
    main = paste('N(t=0) =', Nt0), ylim =c(0, 2))
  abline(h = 1, lty = 2, col='grey')

```
